title: Minecraft教育版化学更新发布（1.0.27）
author: cc7w
txt_content:
https://feedback.minecraft.net/knowledgebase/articles/1841977-education-edition-chemistry-update-1-0-27
The Chemistry Update for Minecraft: Education Edition offers ** new tools to explore the world of chemistry in Minecraft. The Chemistry Resource Pack allows you and your students to conduct experiments within Minecraft that simulate real world science. 
Minecraft教育版的化学更新提供了在Minecraft中探索化学世界的新工具。化学资源包允许你和你的学生模仿现实世界来在Minecraft中进行实验。

A full guide to getting started with the Chemistry Update can be found at https://aka.ms/labjournal 
开始使用化学更新的详细教程：https://aka.ms/labjournal 

Client:
客户端：
New template called World of Chemistry新的“化学世界”模板


Code Connection:
代码链接：
Version number is included in bottom left corner. Please include this number when contacting our Support Team左下角会显示版本信息了，在联系我们的支持团队时请给出本信息The back arrow was removed. To return to the development environment selection screen, please click on the Code Connection text返回箭头被删除，要想回到开发环境选择界面的话，请点击代码链接文本Added a warning when closing the application that this will cause Code Connection to disconnect增加关闭应用会导致失去与代码链接的警告


Classroom Mode:
教室模式：
Version number included in bottom left corner, please include this number when contacting our Support Team左下角会显示版本信息了，在联系我们的支持团队时请给出本信息


Visit our knowledge base https://education.minecraft.net/support/knowledgebase/ to find articles and how-to manuals to help you master Minecraft: Education Edition. Can’t find what you’re looking for? Contact us via the ‘Support’ tab and we’ll follow up with you personally to address your issue.

浏览信息库来寻找教育版的相关教程。找不到你想要的东西吗？通过“支持”键来联系我们，我们会为你私人解决问题的。
